Text.Text: Fleet-Footed Porters
A well-drilled warehouse crew moves crates as smoothly as a legion on the march.
Research Warehouse Organisation.
Relay Cart Crews
Give the cart crews a clear path and they will outpace even your boldest promises to the senate.
Mercury's Wagon Trains
At this pace the wagons blur into one long line, and only the tally boards prove nothing has gone missing.
Research Warehouse Halved Costs.
Frugal Horrea Overseers
Our warehouse overseers squeeze every denarius until it squeals, yet the crates still march in perfect order.
Trim the shifts, tighten the ledgers, and somehow the goods still flow as if Rome itself were watching.
Research Portitores.
Reduces the running costs and Workforce needed for all Warehouses.
Slimmed-Down Shifts
When a lean crew moves cargo like a full cohort, you know your drills were worth all the shouting.
Fewer hands on the floor, fewer complaints in the barracks, and not a single crate left behind.
Research Frugal Horrea Overseers.
Greatly reduces the Workforce needed for all Warehouses.
Penny-Pinching Quartermasters
A roof that leaks coin is worse than one that leaks rain, and these horrea have finally learned the lesson.
The accountants nod at your warehouses almost as proudly as the legates nod at your legions.
Further reduces the running costs of all Warehouses.
